doc.field: This critic's choice eatery serves up delicious lunch and dinner specials on a rotating basis plus a menu of chaat...
Indian mini-chain with for dine-in or takeout. Specialty naan, vegetarian dishes, daily specials.
Indian chaat have never sparked a frenzied trend on par with Mediterranean small plates. But they're worthy of one...
This outpost of the Bay Area chain features small plates like tandoori wraps and lentil dumplings.
